title: Catastrophize
lyrics:
So when my thoughts take off
May I deep breathe
Lord, help me strong
When old loss come to me
Keep my fingers crossed
Keep my knees weak

Are we all such fragile things?

And remember the past

But not hang on to our old ways

Let's pity laugh at the jokes we tell in bad ways

All my friends think I'm funny in a sad way

But they know not how they speak



Hope I've got all your shit in way for time

To change your luck

And open up those lights

Oh don't you know

Don't you know that you're the last thing on my mind

Oh my

Catastrophize

Oh my

Catastrophize



Let me see the world

Through the kindness of my dad's eyes

Let every photograph be taken from my bad side

So when the world sees my face

They'll never ask why

I look the way I do

So let my show

Be the only thing to guide me

I've told the world

And all the anger dies behind me

So if I fail

I can blame it on bad timing

I love nothing that I can lose



Hope I've got all your shit in way for time

To change your luck

And open up those lights

Oh don't you know

Don't you know that you're the last thing on my mind

Oh my

Catastrophize

Oh my

Catastrophize



Hope I've got all your shit in way for time

To change your luck

And open up those lights

Oh don't you know

Don't you know that you're the last thing on my mind

Oh my

Catastrophize

Oh my

Catastrophize

Hope I've got all your shit in way for time

To change your luck

And open up those lights

Oh don't you know

Don't you know that you're the last thing on my mind

Oh my

Catastrophize

Oh my

Catastrophize

Oh my

Catastrophize
